title: How to be a writer or not...
description: A beginners guide. REVISED! NOW WITH BOOKLET 2 Added!This is not for authors who have already published in some way. This is just a rough beginners self help guide to get people interested in writing, started.When I first wrote a book, I went into everything blindly, learning sometimes wrongly as I went along.This is to try and help stop those mistakes from happening and to help our new budding authors before they jump into this very large, frustrating world.Because the writing world is changing so much.
author: Ruth Watson-Morris
